thepain:Protection.NAME: Protection
DESCRIPTIONS: Heal for the number of stacks of blood you have at the end of your turn.

thepain:Blood.NAME: Blood
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain a stack of blood for each HP lost from self damage. NL Resets to 0 at the end of your turn.

thepain:Relief.NAME: Relief
DESCRIPTIONS: Lose #b2 HP at the start of your turn. NL Heal #b2 HP at the end of your turn.

thepain:Bleed.NAME: Bleed
DESCRIPTIONS: Lose #b2 HP at the start of your turn. NL Draw #b1 extra card a turn.
